akn:section.akn:heading: TRICARE program: extension of dependent coverage

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In accordance with subsection (c), an individual described in subsection (b) shall be deemed to be a dependent (as described in section 1072(2)(D) of this title) for purposes of coverage under the TRICARE program.
(b) An individual described in this subsection is an individual who—
